programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Get To Know Everyone in Bay St. Louis, MS
programme.desc: In spite of recent storms, this community grows stronger and stronger. Experience the neighborly love for yourself in Bay St. Louis, Mississippi.

programme.title: Americas Most Delish
programme.sub-title: America's Most Delish Midwest: 10 Old School Classics From The Midwest that Stood the Test of Time
programme.desc: Indulge in the old-school classics that have reigned in the Midwest for decades. From Wisconsin cheese curds to Kansas City's burnt ends, enjoy these unique comfort foods that are as timeless as they are tasty.

programme.title: My Perfect Day
programme.sub-title: My Perfect Day with Woman's Day: Grandmothers Pinky-Promise to Self Care
programme.desc: Karla, a devoted mother and doting grandmother has had her fair share of obstacles from two bouts of cancer to caring for her husband and daughter. Karla embarks on a much needed day of pampering, seeking solace and self-care.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate It, Pittsburgh!: Summer Cookout
programme.desc: Fire up the grill and pour a cold one. Chefs Carleen King and Neil Blazin are facing off in a Summer Cookout cook-off. Can our chefs keep their cool? Or will they melt down in the summer heat?

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Blind Kitchen: Creole Cook-Off
programme.desc: Meet a pair of dueling Creole dishes when Chef Eric Cook of Gris Gris battles it out against Chef Ericka Michelle Lassair of Diva Dawg. Will “Chef Diva’s” signature sauce stump her worthy opponent, or will “Cookie” manage to pull a rabbit out of a chef’s hat?

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: Kara & Jessica
programme.desc: A Missouri community seeks answers when two young women disappear a decade apart

programme.title: Silver Linings
programme.sub-title: Silver Linings: Not Your Grandmother's Retirement
programme.desc: Welcome to Lancaster, PA, one of the country's hottest retirement hubs. Here, seniors, from a beauty pageant queen to a 90 year-old swim champion aren’t slowing down; they’re rewriting the playbook and redefining aging in America.

programme.title: Show Me Milwaukee
programme.sub-title: Show Me Milwaukee: Olympic Gymnastics, Speed Skating Races, and Sailing Lake Michigan
programme.desc: Greg hangs out with world champion gymnast, Chellsie Memmel, as they explore the Olympic history of Milwaukee. They meet up with other Olympians, including Gold medalist Bonnie Blair, for an exciting day of gymnastics, speed skating, and more!

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Band's Homecoming Hits High Note For Generosity
programme.desc: Who says you can't go home again? The team travels back to where it all began to pay back the kindness they experienced 25 years ago when they first got started.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.sub-title: Stitch: Fearless Rescues
programme.desc: From stepping in front of moving traffic to swimming toward a shark attack, these are the stories of those in trouble, and the courageous people and animals who risked everything to help.

programme.title: My Amazing Cheap Date
programme.sub-title: Cheap Date: Food Festivals & Stand-Up
programme.desc: Two Orlando couples binge on burgers, bring out their inner nerd at geek-centric hot spots, and go nuts at a pinball lounge.

programme.title: Boston Rob Does Beantown
programme.sub-title: Boston Rob Does Beantown: Southie On Ice
programme.desc: Rob hits up a new wine tasting spot, gets a butt contouring treatment, knocks down some pins and then hits the ice at Warrior Ice Arena.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Hide & Seek
programme.desc: You can run. You can hide. But chances are, they’re still gonna find you. These are some of the wildest and most bizarre police captures on record.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: A Single Father's Life-Saving Last Act
programme.desc: Single father Kendal Fenwick is the 295th homicide in Baltimore in 2015. Family and investigators wonder whether his efforts to curb drugs and violence in his neighborhood made him a target. Or is it something else entirely?

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate It! Baltimore: Sweet Treats...or Savory Fails?
programme.desc: Chefs Jason Hisley and Amanda Mack are going head to head in a sweet treats challenge. Can the chefs create a winning sweet and savory meal? Or will this be a sugar rush they want to forget?

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Choose Adventure In Newport, RI
programme.desc: Catch the perfect sunset after learning to sail or riding the rails. Devour a cheeseboard al fresco, sip on a cool drink poolside, or slide into a booth at a classic Italian restaurant. This is Newport.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.sub-title: Local Love: Endearing Dater is Ready for His Perfect Match
programme.desc: Maxwell, a young professional, is taking a chance on love with three blind dates. Will things get playful with Hannah, stay sweet with Kambree or will Maxwell cross the finish line with Paige?

programme.title: Ballin' in Baltimore
programme.sub-title: Ballin' in Baltimore: Baseball Legend Ryan Ripken Pitches Angel a Day of Iconic Institutions
programme.desc: Angel joins baseball legend, Ryan Ripken, for a home run day, exploring the best of Baltimore. They bat 100 at Ripken Stadium, learn about sea life at the National Aquarium, crush indoor rock climbing and show down in an epic cook-off.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Dare to Zip Over Rock Hill, SC
programme.desc: Rock Hill, South Carolina is chock full of adventure. From zip-lining through the trees to wake boarding with a pro. You can also admire beautiful murals by local artists, visit hard cider orchards and get snuggly in a romantic lakeside cabin.

programme.title: The Middle Child
programme.sub-title: News 9 True Crime: The Middle Child
programme.desc: (2022) In the 1980s, a serial killer buried a woman and three girls in the woods of New Hampshire. One of those girls is still unidentified. WMUR joins the investigators who promise they won’t give up until her name is restored.

programme.title: Chronicle: Slice of the 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: (2023) An exploration into what makes Pittsburgh’s pizza scene so special, and the impact pizza shops have on their communities.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.sub-title: Local Love: World Traveler Comes Home for Love
programme.desc: After traveling the world, Colleen is back home in Cincinnati looking to settle down but not settle. As she looks to find her forever mate, three single guys try impress her with a painting, curling on the ice and a tango lesson.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Celebrating the Life and Legacy of a Local Superfan
programme.desc: After the passing of their good friend and local superfan, Roy Small, the team finds ways to carry on his legacy. See how they bring the community together to celebrate his life.

programme.title: Show Me Milwaukee
programme.sub-title: Show Me Milwaukee: Outdoor Adventures
programme.desc: Wisconsin travel content creator Chelsey Knuth shows Greg her favorite outdoor adventures. Greg tries rock climbing, visits a hidden beer garden, and the Urban Ecology Center deep in the woods.

programme.title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot
programme.sub-title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot: Indie Rockers, Selfie Queen, & Pedal Peddler Belt Out Top Hot Spots
programme.desc: We're rockin' with notable locals Hembree, JHS Pedals, and India Wells-Carter, who all love the little things that make Kansas City unique, like The National Museum of Toys and Miniatures, handmade marshmallows, and complimentary hotel room robes.

programme.title: Americas Most Delish
programme.sub-title: America's Most Delish Midwest: 10 Midwest Holiday Delights to Make Seasons Bright
programme.desc: Celebrate some of the Midwest's holiday favorites. Where scotcheroos take center stage, snicker salads delight, and the pink stuff surprises the pallet.

programme.title: My Perfect Day
programme.sub-title: My Perfect Day with Woman's Day: Selfless Soul Receives Moments of Joy One Surprise at a Time
programme.desc: Kar is a selfless soul known for his unwavering commitment to the unhoused in his community. It's Kar's turn to have some good old-fashioned fun.

programme.title: Weathering the Storm
programme.sub-title: Weathering the Storm: Couple Faces Historic Tornado on Eve of Wedding
programme.desc: On December 10, 2021, a violent tornado outbreak hit western Kentucky. It was the deadliest weather event in the history of the Commonwealth. But as families faced a bleak holiday season, hope emerged in surprising ways.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Ed and Day in the ‘Burgh: Hanging Out in Homewood
programme.desc: Ed and Day travel to Homewood to see if they have what it takes to be urban beekeepers, elite barbers, and African dancers and drummers.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.sub-title: Stitch: Unplanned Bonds, Lasting Ties
programme.desc: New connections form in the most unlikely places. In this episode, chance encounters forge lasting friendships and transformative relationships.

programme.title: Matter of Fact
programme.sub-title: Matter of Fact: Reuniting Siblings
programme.desc: This week Matter of Fact visits a summer camp that’s reuniting siblings separated by the foster care system. Plus, a legal expert explains the impact of the Supreme Court taking on more emergency cases. And, a New York farmer brings fresh produce to underserved communities.

programme.title: Chronicle: Legacy of Flight 427
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: (2024) Recounting the tragedy of US Airways Flight 427 that crashed in Beaver County, and talking with families and first responders 30 years later.

programme.title: WTAE 4 The Record
programme.sub-title: 4 The Record: Connect, Protect, Recover
programme.desc: This morning, a local initiative aimed at tackling drug addiction in our communities and providing resources to impacted families.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: Worms and Wilderness
programme.desc: Glenda Macatangay has conquered her career and being a single mom to four kids. But when it comes to being comfortable in the outdoors, she isn’t as confident. Kinga meets up with Glenda in Sacramento, CA to introduce her to the wonders of the wilderness.

programme.title: Sports Town Stories
programme.sub-title: Sports Town Stories: Burlington Athletes Overcome Obstacles in the Most Vermont of Ways
programme.desc: From a skier who turned her tragedy into the state's biggest charity event, to a cyclist who energizes others with maple syrup, you can't take the "Vermont" out of Burlington athletes.

programme.title: On The Job
programme.sub-title: On The Job: Brendan Dances Down the Yellow Brick Road
programme.desc: Brendan wields the baton leading the orchestra, achieves his dream of performing with a cast of Queens, and serves up das boot with German local legends.

programme.title: Free Spirit
programme.sub-title: Free Spirit : How Art and Mixology Meet Up in Santa Fe
programme.desc: Kate explores gin and rituals with a master distiller, talks art and cocktails with an Indigenous painter, and gets a lesson in moving mixology on George R.R. Martin’s adventure train in the high-desert city of Santa Fe.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: Screens Off, Adventure On!
programme.desc: Camryn Simpson, a 21-year-old student at the University of Pittsburgh and ambassador on social media platforms can’t take time away from her phone. With the help of Kinga, Camryn will log-out of social media and log-in to the outdoors to find adventure.

programme.title: The Middle Child
programme.sub-title: News 9 True Crime: The Middle Child
programme.desc: (2022) In the 1980s, a serial killer buried a woman and three girls in the woods of New Hampshire. One of those girls is still unidentified. WMUR joins the investigators who promise they won’t give up until her name is restored.

programme.title: Chronicle: Pittsburgh After Dark
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: (2024) In this episode of "Chronicle," we're going to look at the side of Pittsburgh you don't normally see: When the sun does down and the moon comes up.

programme.title: Ethan: The Miracle Dog
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Follow one dog's journey to recovery, a forever home and eventually, stardom.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: White-Collar Crimes
programme.desc: These criminals may not have blood on their hands, but they still leave despair in their wake. From shady non-profits to fraudulent contractors, to wide-spread postal theft, here are some of the most devastating white-collar crimes to be attempted across the country.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Chefs recreate each other’s signature dish, but they can only determine what the dish is using their senses of taste, touch and smell. When the masks come off, the heat is on, with each chef attempting to cook their opponent’s creation.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate it, Pittsburgh!: Between The Bread
programme.desc: In honor of Pittsburgh's love of handhelds, Chef Claudy Pierre and Chef Alex Brown get creative crafting their best sandwich-inspired dishes.
